public class StatLogger

logDamage

public static void logDamage(java.lang.Integer round,
                             java.lang.String source,
                             java.lang.String target,
                             java.lang.Integer amount)
Write stats to the log: round,source,target,damage_amount.

Parameters:
round - round of combat
source - source handle
target - target handle
amount - amount of damage (negative values indicate healing)

logDeath

public static void logDeath(java.lang.Integer round,
                            java.lang.String source,
                            java.lang.String target)
Write stats to the log: round,source,target,DEAD.

Parameters:
round - round of combat
source - source handle
target - target handle

logOA

public static void logOA(java.lang.String fighter)
Write informational message to log, indicating previous message was an opportunity attack by a different fighter.

Parameters:
fighter - the fighter's handle
